body.p: [Wilde thanks her for her sympathetic message conveyed by her husband.]
[Reflects on the suffering of imprisonment and acknowledges his former life as “unworthy of an artist.”]
[Mentions his mother and Stannard’s admiration for her.]
[Describes his quiet life in a small inn by the sea and his use of the pseudonym Sebastian Melmoth.]
[Asks that his location remain completely secret and sends verses as thanks.]
